Entries.Saloon_Entry: Glad to be out of the rain...

Entries.winter_Thu8: Something about winter just feels so..depressing.#$b#My doctor says it might be seasonal...something something?$s
Entries.fall_15{{YearRemainder}}: I'm so ready for the Stardew Fair, @, I've been working on my grange display for weeks!$h

Entries.Town4: Gonna be honest, @, I never understood why you'd move to a town like this anyways...#$b#But I guess this is a good place to start a family...

Entries.winter_Wed6: Between you and I, @, I'm glad how toasty this place is in winter.#$e#Pretty cold when I have to brave the elements to go to the saloon, though.
Entries.fall_Tue6: Feel free to bring your geodes to me, I'll crack them open for a small fee...
Entries.fall_Wed8: Sometimes, when I'm lying in bed awake at night, I wonder what happens to all the swords I make.$s
Entries.6{{YearRemainder}}: I'd consider moving elsewhere, but I'm not sure I could afford the rent.#$e#My family has owned this building for as long as I can remember. Helps a lot with my expenses.
Entries.7{{YearRemainder}}: I've got a cousin in Grampleton who's a glassblower.#$e#He's attached to one of the local universities, he does custom glassware for them. Cushy job, somehow.
Entries.8{{YearRemainder}}: I sell ore, too, if you need it.#$b#It's not too expensive, I can order in bulk, but my suppliers aren't exactly giving it away either.
Entries.9{{YearRemainder}}: My doctor says I should go outside more. I'm not quite sure what I'd do with myself outside, though.
Entries.Resort_Wander: Wow, @, this place is beautiful...if a little too hot.
Entries.Resort_Pier: @, do you think that's a shark?

Entries.winter_Wed10: I've got a cousin in Grampleton who makes hard candies now, the old fashioned way. Made him his cooling table, his candy cutters, and, of course, the candy hook.$h
Entries.6_2: Got a commission from %place for a pile of swords. That'll be nice for the ole' balance sheet.
Entries.8_2: What would I've done if I didn't become a blacksmith? Err, @, I'm not sure actually.$s#$b#Didn't really have an idea of what I wanted to become as a kid. Just followed my father's footsteps.
Entries.10_2: My family has been blacksmiths in this here town for as long as I can remember....
Entries.12_2: We used to have a lot more coal coming out of that mine. It's been dryin' up lately, I feel.
Entries.14_2: Heya, @, what have you been up to?#$b#Me? Just the same old, same old.
Entries.16_2: Got any tools you'd like me to upgrade?
Entries.18_2: It's important to temper your swords correctly. If you don't, they may shatter when you strike things.
Entries.22_2: Marlon just placed another order for swords.$h#$b#I hope he'll be satisfied with the ones I make!
Entries.23_2: What should I have for dinner...should I go to the Saloon?
Entries.24_2: My doctor says I should take up a hobby, but I'm not sure what.#$b#Maybe I'll start knitting, like Emily...#$b#Or maybe I should make jewelery?

Entries.6_2: %Clint is mumbling to himself.#$b#Gosh, this economy doesn't help matters...$s#$e#Oh, what? It's nothing.
Entries.12_2: I've really only left Pelican Town for long enough to do an apprenticeship in Grampleton. This's where I've been all my life.$s
Entries.14_2: I'm really hoping I can drum up some more commissions, I need the money.$s
Entries.16_2: Thing about downturns...people want less bespoke work, makes it hard for artisans like me.
Entries.18_2: If I could start my life over? I...I don't know what I would do, @.
Entries.19_2: Some days I wish I was braver, but the mines scare me so much.$s
Entries.24_2: If I could start my life over...what would I be...#$b#You know, @, I'm not sure...$s
Entries.25_2: Junimo Kart...no, that's not really my type of thing, sorry.#$b#Lewis is pretty good though, he might be able to give you a few pointers.
